snippet: LEAD: When the boxloads of books forced her husband's car out of the driveway and into the street, it was time for Marilyn Levin Nemzer to make a decision about her new project....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: When the boxloads of books forced her husband's car out of the driveway and into the street, it was time for Marilyn Levin Nemzer to make a decision about her new project.

headline.main: California Educators Taking New Leaf From Book Exchange

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
